description: President Trump has threatened to shut down Twitter, regulate social media and expand the government's power to oversee the Web, part of an all-out assault against Silicon Valley tech giants that he has long accused of trying to undermine his reelection.
content: The tensions erupted again into public view Friday, after Twitter took the unprecedented step of limiting the reach and visibility of one of Trumps tweets. The company said the president had glorifie… [+7586 chars]
source.name: The Washington Post

author: Michelle Ye Hee Lee
title: Trump to headline in-person fundraisers in June, his first since coronavirus outbreak
description: All attendees must test negative for coronavirus and pass a temperature check, party officials said.
content: Both events will be geared toward wealthy donors, charging $580,600 per couple for the Dallas event and $250,000 per person for the New Jersey event. The money will go to Trump Victory, a committee t… [+2287 chars]
source.name: The Washington Post
